query.statement:
SELECT MANDT , '' AS CHECK , ARA -- 대지역 , ZZBSU -- 협력사 , BSU -- 협력사 코드 , ZGUBUN -- 건물용도 , NAM -- 고객명 , POSID -- 원WBS , HNO -- 호기 , HNA -- 호기명 , ZBEPJEO -- 완성검사일 , ZBOSUIN -- 보수인수일 , ZOIPSU -- 입주일 , MAT_CODE , MATNR , MAKTX , EXDATE , CHDATE , POSID_1 FROM ( SELECT ZMA.MANDT AS MANDT , Z01.CS101_ARA AS ARA -- 대지역 , SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_NAME(ZMA2.MANDT, ZMA2.ZZBSU) AS ZZBSU -- 협력사 , ZMA2.ZZBSU AS BSU -- 협력사 코드 , ZMA2.ZGUBUN AS ZGUBUN -- 건물용도 , CASE WHEN ZMA.KUNNR_NM > '' THEN ZMA.KUNNR_NM ELSE ZMA.ZSITE_NM END AS NAM -- 고객명 , ZMA.POSID AS POSID -- 원WBS , Z01.CS101_HNO AS HNO -- 호기 , Z01.CS101_HNA AS HNA -- 호기명 , ZMA2.ZBEPJEO AS ZBEPJEO -- 완성검사일 , ZMA2.ZBOSUIN AS ZBOSUIN -- 보수인수일 , ZMA2.ZOIPSU AS ZOIPSU -- 입주일 , M95.MAT_CODE AS MAT_CODE -- 보수 관리 코드 , M95.MATNR AS MATNR -- 자재번호 , M11.MAKTX AS MAKTX -- 품명 , SAPHEE.GET_MM_CHANGEDATE(ZMA.MANDT,VALUE(M95.CHDATE,''), M95.MAT_CODE) AS EXDATE -- 출고일 , M95.CHDATE AS CHDATE , ZMA2.POSID_1 AS POSID_1 FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT095 AS M95 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS ZMA2 ON ZMA2.MANDT = M95.MANDT AND ZMA2.POSID_1 = M95.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS ZMA ON ZMA2.MANDT = ZMA.MANDT AND ZMA2.POSID = ZMA.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST101 AS Z01 ON Z01.MANDT = ZMA.MANDT -- 보수 인수인계 정보 AND Z01.CS101_PJT || Z01.CS101_HNO = ZMA2.POSID_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT011 M11 ON M11.MANDT = M95.MANDT AND M11.MATNR = M95.MATNR
WHERE M95.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND ZMA.POSID > ''
AND M95.POSID LIKE #POSID# || '%'
AND M95.MAT_CODE = #MAT_CODE#
AND M95.CHDATE BETWEEN #DATE_FM# AND #DATE_TO#
AND ZMA2.ZZBSU = #CB3#
AND ZMA2.ZZBPM = #CB2#
AND ZMA2.ZZBSU IN (SELECT MM005.LGORT FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B010, SAPHEE.ZMMT005 MM005 WHERE B010.MANDT = MM005.MANDT AND B010.LIFNR = MM005.LIFNR AND B010.MANDT= #G_MANDT# AND B010.VKGRP LIKE #CB2# || '%')
) AS A WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY ARA, BSU, ZGUBUN, POSID, HNO, MAT_CODE, MATNR
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
